name: 林祐正
objective: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠經由防救災或工程管理之需求分析開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而設計一個BIM在防救災與管理之實務應用，其內容包括：BIM自動化防救災應用，BIM實務應用，國內外BIM案例探討，BIM應用之分析與設計，BIM系統在防救災與工程管理之應用等內容。
schedule:
Course topics:
1. Building Information Modeling
2. BIM Basics Introduction
3. Building Information Modeling for collaboration
4. Applications of BIM in Design Phase
5. Application of BIM in Construction Phase
6. Applications of BIM in Operation Phase
7. Application of BIM in Disaster Prevention
8. Application of BIM in Engineering Management
9. Special Topics in BIM for Disaster Prevention and Engineering Management
10. Special Speeches in BIM
materials:
參考書目:
1. BIM Handbook: A Guide to Building Information Modeling for Owners, Managers, Designers, Engineers and Contractors
